reviews.text: Sunstone Pools & Outdoor Living 1900 Industrial Blvd Ste 200, Colleyville, TX 76034

"Excellent service and installation, the entire process was seamless." "We have recommended Sunstone to many folks for their quality of work." "Small advise wait until the finished product before you complain."

We could not be happier with the experience and result of working with Sunstone Pools. They did a fantastic job of turning our yard into what all of our friends and family call an oasis and a resort. Their team on contractors, … More

Brad Cormac and his team did a complete renovation for our pool, decking, tile, etc and it is beautiful. We could not be more pleased. We highly recommend them. Timely, good follow through and skilled craftsman.

The team at Sunstone did an amazing job on our pool.  It started with the design, which was so far beyond anything we were envisioning.  When the pool was finished, it surpassed our expectations.  They transformed our yard into a resort. … More Response from the owner 2 years ago We are thankful for the kind words and thé privilege of working for you.
Platinum Pools And Outdoor Living DFW Outdoor Design & Construction
